crew.p: Dancers: Agate Bankava, Alise Putniņa, Anna Novikova, Anne Birte Norda, Anastasija Lonšakova, Eva Kronberga, Karīna Lapšina, Maija Tjurjapina, Taisija Frolova, Jānis Putniņš, Ģirts Bisenieks, Ivars Broničs, Modris Opelts, Rūdolfs Gediņš
Supported by: Ibsen Scholarships, State Culture Capital Foundation of Latvia, Riga City Council

body.p: The performance studies the modern man’s ability to go beyond the usual comfort zone in the name of a higher purpose. In the process of generating ideas, Henrik Ibsen’s drama „Brand” was taken as the literary source of the performance. It does not follow the storyline of the drama closely, yet the well-known Brand’s motto, „Be forgiven – if you were not able, but never – if you did not want”, has become the key driving force during the creation process of the performance.
The idea of the performance has won the International Ibsen Scholarship in 2013.
